9 New media attack says Trump "knew" about Epstein's underage girls, but they conveniently forgot to mention one important detail 🤔 (notthebee.com) posted 3 hours ago by hansgruber7 4 comments award share report block New media attack says Trump "knew" about Epstein's underage girls, but they conveniently forgot to mention one important detail ... The Democrats are getting to the bottom of the whole Epstein coverup! notthebee.com

Make America a western country again first, then pursue criminals. permalink award report block reply friarfox 1 points 2 hours ago He was already implicated but the point is now that there is no one to back that up. Never mind Israel's control over the abusers , it's a question of action. So? You see that any 15 year old can put the pieces together. These girls were beaten , tortured and raped for the amusement of the tiny hat people. Everyone knows and no one will do a damn thing about it. I don't know if Trump was involved but I do know he is the one burying the story.
